name: Hover Action Larger Threshold
description: Its almost impossible to click on the Gizmo, unless you are on the exact pixel. For this: a larger invisible mesh was created which acts like a collider, which the pointer can interact with.

name: Hover state
description: Currently there is no hover state being maintained when grabbing the gizmo. Even if your dragging the gizmo, if your mouse leaves the mesh the hover material will dissappear. For this we have added a dragged state

name: 'Grey out' other axis while manipulating Gizmo
description: This has been achieved by maintaining state between the three clickable meshes

name: Rotation Circle on User Drag
description: Currently when the user drags only the geometry will move, the gizmo remains the same. This feature allows the user to understand the rate by which they are rotating the object.
